blogPost.title: What is the smallest change with the biggest impact in regards to climate? Answer by @KirstenHagon, Senior Humanitarian Policy Analyst. https://t.co/5ev4EHktep https://t.co/W4CqbVrl35

localize.full_text: 对气候影响最大的最小变化是什么？回答者：@KirstenHagon，高级人道主义政策分析员。https://t.co/5ev4EHktep https://t.co/W4CqbVrl35

previous.title: What is your advice to kids who say they want to be professional gamers when they grow up? Answer by @TheChopper, Head of Esports for North America at Riot Games. https://t.co/YUhllU1GQg https://t.co/18KZfFEHQg

localize.full_text: 对于那些说长大后想成为职业玩家的孩子，你有什么建议？由Riot Games北美地区Esports负责人@TheChopper回答。https://t.co/YUhllU1GQg https://t.co/18KZfFEHQg。
對於那些說長大後想成爲職業玩家的孩子，你有什麼建議？由Riot Games北美地區Esports負責人@TheChopper回答。https://t.co/YUhllU1GQg https://t.co/18KZfFEHQg。
大人になったらプロのゲーマーになりたい」と言う子供たちにアドバイスをお願いします。Answer by @TheChopper, Head of Esports for North America at Riot Games. https://t.co/YUhllU1GQg https://t.co/18KZfFEHQg

next.title: What is the relationship between stress and fertility? Answer by Alice D. Domar, Ph.D, Executive Director, Domar Centers for Mind/Body Health. https://t.co/G30XHta8lh https://t.co/Q3zhFSDFny

localize.full_text: 压力和生育力之间的关系是什么？回答者：爱丽丝-D-多玛博士，多玛身心健康中心执行主任。https://t.co/G30XHta8lh https://t.co/Q3zhFSDFny。
